column4: i have to setup a forum & discussion board for my company. Should i use PunBB or phpBB2. Which one is better?
for what card
an irc server, an im service,
can you please give more details please
can you please give more details please
pls give more detail on irc server and im service

I have got a new broadband connection just now. I connected it to my netgear wireless router, to which my laptop, server and desktops are connected. the LAN ip addr are 10.0.0.2 instead of 192.168.1.2. This was nt so with my old ISP. please help me out. however the internet is working fine
not sure wht your asking
it looks like your getting dhcp from a new device on a new private address range, it's not a problem
10. and 192 re just common private address ranges
but the server on which i hosted the website is not viewable
probably because your port forwarding is no setup on your new router
it is setup
well it must be setup to point to the old 192 address
according to the modem the IPs are in 192 series. but according to the router they are in 10. series
ok - so you've got conflicting ip ranges
yes
what can be done now?
well you need to get the IP info from 1 source, either the router or the modem, OR set them both to use the same network
my advice would be to disable dhcp on one device and only get dhcp info from the modem
i will try that
